name: Dodeca Surfer
description:
Play as a futuristic hoverboarder surfing down an endless hole in the ground, kickflip and spin around this hole as you trick over obstacles and last as long as possible can you beat the default high-score, or will you run out of time?

This was a submission to Brackey's 2020.1 Game Jam. The theme this time round was "Holes" and boy do we have holes!

We hope you enjoy playing our game.
